channel.title: Midi receive source
channel.description: Hey there, is it possible to differentiate from which source midi input is coming? I control my patch with a midi controller which is connected to usb_host_port1 of the axoloti. I want to differentiate between the midi cc messages coming directly from the controller or the ones I recorded to a sequencer which is connected to the axolotis din input. At the moment I do this by changing the midi channel but it is not so handy like this... Is there a way to change the midi handler somehow? thanks in advance, FLub

item.title: Midi receive source
item.dc:creator: @Flub Flo
item.description:
@Flub wrote:

Thank you very much for the tip!

Read full topic

item.title: Midi receive source
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

you have to open the subpatch and go to edit settings and check "has midi selector"

Read full topic

item.title: Midi receive source
item.dc:creator: @Flub Flo
item.description:
@Flub wrote:

I dont know whay I dont have these options...

Read full topic

item.title: Midi receive source
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

you can only do this on patch compilation, not while running, is that your question? or did you not get a midi selector at all on the subpatch?

it should look like this:

item.title: Midi receive source
item.dc:creator: @lokki
item.description:
@lokki wrote:

you can embed the patch in a subpatch to get a midi selector, but it is not a runtime choice...

item.title: Midi receive source
item.dc:creator: @Flub Flo
item.description:
@Flub wrote:

Hey there,
is it possible to differentiate from which source midi input is coming?
I control my patch with a midi controller which is connected to usb_host_port1 of the axoloti.
I want to differentiate between the midi cc messages coming directly from the controller or the ones I recorded
to a sequencer which is connected to the axolotis din input.
At the moment I do this by changing the midi channel but it is not so handy like this...
Is there a way to change the midi handler somehow?
thanks in advance,
FLub

Read full topic
